issue.title: [C++] json parser should not rely on null terminated buffers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4699](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4699). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*
